job_description:
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
• 2+ years of experience in AI/ML development, preferably in the consumer electronics or IoT industry.
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and C++.
• Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
• Strong background in computer vision, deep learning, LLM, or reinforcement learning.
• Experience with embedded AI and edge computing frameworks (e.
• , ONNX, NVIDIA Jetson).
• Knowledge of data processing pipelines, model training, and hyperparameter tuning.
